message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay $60 for it.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I can't sell it to you for $60. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm offering it to you for $90.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $90. I'd like to meet you in the middle at $75. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product.
I understand you're trying to reach your budget, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering it to you for $95.
I'm trying to be reasonable, but I'm still not comfortable with $95. I'm willing to meet you at $85. I'm really interested in the product, and I'd like to make a deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $110. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm offering it to you for $105.
